abstract: A reorganization plan that General Growth Properties intends to file as soon as Wednesday will give the bankrupt mall operator until Dec. 31 to solicit other offers, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: A reorganization plan that General Growth Properties intends to file as soon as Wednesday will give the bankrupt mall operator until Dec. 31 to solicit other offers, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: 7:14 p.m. | Updated A reorganization plan that General Growth Properties intends to file as soon as Wednesday will give the bankrupt mall operator until Dec. 31 to solicit other offers, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: General Growth Plan Allows Time to Seek Other Bids

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
